main.description: A discussion post within a community, optionally linked to a segment or list item. Supports threaded replies via parentPostUri.

segmentUri.description: AT-URI of the community.opensocial.segment this post discusses

listItemUri.description: AT-URI of the community.opensocial.listitem this post discusses (when not tied to a specific segment)

parentPostUri.description: AT-URI of the parent post (for threaded replies)

authorDid.description: DID of the member who wrote this post

mentionedDids.description: DIDs of members mentioned in this post (for notifications)
